_xResult.title: Slip Under Fire Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made sheer dress with black and red fringes
_xResult.longdesc:
This made to measure dress is classic, stunning, and a real show-stopper. The sheer outer layer ends in fringes at the bottom in the perfect cocktail of black and red. The slimming slip compliments curves and shows off all the right places. Sport this beauty for a romantic dinner or fancy cocktail party, but be warned—people won’t be able to take their eyes off of you!


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
